questions.question: A list is defined using ________ brackets.
List items are separated using ________ (comma).
The ________ function is used to find the number of items in a list.
The first item on a list has a positive index of ________.
The last item on a list has a negative index of ________.
Negative index allows us to access the list from the ________.
A condition in Python always returns a ________ result.
The two Boolean values in Python are ________ and ________.
The relational operator > means ________.
The relational operator >= means ________.
The relational operator < means ________.
The relational operator <= means ________.
The relational operator == means ________.
The relational operator != means ________.
In Python, ________ is used to define blocks of code.
To indent code, we insert a ________ or tab key at the beginning of each line.
Conditional statements are used to make ________ in Python.
The for loop can be used to ________ through sequences.
Iterate means to go through ________ by element.
The range function has three parameters: ________, stop and step.
In range function, the start value is ________ (included).
In range function, the stop value is ________ (not included).
If range has only one argument, it represents the ________ value.
If range has only one argument, the start value is by default ________.
To count backwards, we use a ________ step value.
The time.sleep(1) function adds a delay of ________ second.
To use time.sleep(), we must first ________ the time module.
The % operator in Python gives the ________ of division.
If n % 2 == 0, then n is an ________ number.
If n % 2 != 0, then n is an ________ number.
To print the range (10, 0, -1): for x in range(10, ________, -1)
To print 3 6 9...30: for x in range(3, ________, 3)
To print 5 10 15...100: for x in range(5, ________, 5)
To print 2 4 6 8 10: for x in range(2, ________, 2)
To print 10 8 6 4 2 0: for x in range(10, ________, -2)
In list subjects = ["English", "Tamil", "Maths"], the item at index 0 is ________.
In list fruits[len(fruits)-1], this expression gives the ________ element.
A list can be ordered, unordered, changeable and allows ________ members.
The minimum age to vote in India is ________ years.
A person aged ________ or above is considered a senior citizen.
